If you start a chain, you always start with facing forward. If you continue to face away from the rope, you always move back to face left. If you started facing toward the rope, you always move forward in front of the rope. If you began facing away from the rope, you always move backward in front of the rope. If you stopped facing away from the rope, you never move forward in front of the rope. Continuing to face forward is the same as remaining facing backward. So, the answer is yes.
